name: Activating Collective Resistance
description: Mobilizing communities and grassroots movements to counter PSN infiltration and control.

cards.title: Building a Decentralized Resistance Network
cards.description: Creating a structure that is resistant to PSN infiltration and disruption.
bulletpoints: Avoiding centralized leadership to prevent targeted takeovers.
Implementing communication security measures to limit PSN interference.
Training members to recognize and resist psychological manipulation.

cards.title: Strength in Numbers: Organizing Psychological Defense Units
cards.description: Structuring small, adaptable groups that reinforce each otherâ€™s defenses against PSN tactics.
bulletpoints: Assigning specific roles to maximize operational efficiency and trust.
Utilizing rapid response strategies to counter PSN disinformation.
Encouraging mental resilience training to fortify group members.

cards.title: Turning the Crowd Against PSNs
cards.description: Redirecting group influence to neutralize PSN social control.
bulletpoints: Using social proof to discredit PSN narratives.
Implementing collective call-out tactics without direct confrontation.
Leveraging community-driven decision-making to prevent PSN influence.
